articles.title: Introduction to AI
articles.author: John Doe
articles.content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a wide-ranging branch of computer science concerned with building smart machines capable of performing tasks that typically require human intelligence.

articles.title: Understanding Machine Learning
articles.author: Jane Doe
articles.content: Machine Learning is a type of artificial intelligence (AI) that allows software applications to become more accurate in predicting outcomes without being explicitly programmed to do so.

articles.title: The Future of Quantum Computing
articles.author: Alex Smith
articles.content: Quantum computing is the area of study focused on developing computer-based technologies centered around the principles of quantum theory.
